title: Lily Allen and David Harbour look happy and in love as they share a kiss
text:
They are fresh off of revealing that they are actually an item.

And now Lily Allen, 34, and David Harbour, 44, are enjoying date night out at the New York Knicks and New Orleans Pelicans preseason game in New York City at Madison Square Garden.

The new Hollywood pair looked like they were enjoying their time together as they sat court-side while laughing and even sharing a kiss before sitting back and relaxing.

Date night: And now Lily Allen and David Harbour are enjoying date night out at the New York Knicks and New Orleans Pelicans preseason game in New York City

Having fun! The new Hollywood pair looked like they were enjoying their time together as they sat court-side while laughing and even sharing a kiss before sitting back and relaxing

The singer showed off her edgy side in a gray sweater with a white lace collar peeking out.

Her sweater was a crewneck with with a black pattern on the front which she wore with a pair of light wash denim jeans that had holes at the knees.

She paired the look with a pair of black boots that she showed off with her jeans rolled up to her ankles.

Oh you're strong! Lily grabbed her new beau's arm while they were sitting next to one another

The Stranger Things star looked smitten as he leaded into kiss and kept looking over at his new girlfriend.

He wore a laidback style with his hair pulled back and a black polo and pants.

David also wore a pair of black boots and seemed to be having fun while hitting the town with Lily.

His look: He wore a laidback style with his hair pulled back and a black polo and pants

Cuddling: Lily leaned into David as he smiled and kissed her as they seemed to be having more fun with each other than watching the game

After his hosting segment on Saturday Night Life last weekend, he was photographed at the after party getting close with Lily.

They were then photographed sharing a kiss as they walked through the city while grabbing lunch together.

Back in January, she revealed that she and her longtime boyfriend DJ boyfriend Meridian Dan had gone their separate ways.

She was previously married to decorator Sam Cooper after getting married in 2011 and announced their divorce in 2016. The two share their two daughters together Marnie Rose, aged six, and Ethel Mary, aged seven.
